item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Couche-Tard 考虑提高对 Seven & i 的收购价格
item.description: 彭博新闻社周四援引熟悉 Couche-Tard 内部谈判的未具名消息人士的话报道称，加拿大 Alimentation Couche-Tard 公司正在讨论将收购日本 Seven & i Holdings 公司的出价提高多少。【原文：Canada's Alimentation Couche-Tard is discussing how much it could raise the offer price to buy Japan's Seven & i Holdings , Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing unnamed sources familiar with Couche-Tard's internal talks.】

item.title: 亚洲股市受华尔街科技股提振上涨，美元受日元影响扩大涨幅
item.description: 亚洲股市周四反弹，追随华尔街科技股的涨势，而美元则在美国核心通胀率意外小幅上扬并使美联储下周大幅降息的希望破灭后保持涨势。【原文：Asian shares bounced on Thursday, tracking a tech-driven rally on Wall Street, while the dollar held onto gains after U.S. core inflation surprised slightly on the upside and dashed hopes of a large rate cut by the Federal Reserve next week.】

item.title: 在费城 Roundup 案的审判中，陪审团裁定拜耳旗下的孟山都公司胜诉
item.description: 拜耳旗下的孟山都公司周三表示，费城法院陪审团在 Young Roundup 产品责任审判中作出了有利于他们的判决。【原文：Bayer's Monsanto unit said on Wednesday that a Philadelphia Court jury reached a verdict in the Young Roundup product liability trial in their favor.】

item.title: 日本央行鹰派决策者呼吁将利率至少上调至 1
item.description: 鹰派决策者田村直树（Naoki Tamura）周四表示，日本央行必须在明年年底前将利率上调至至少1%，这坚定了该行坚持稳步收紧货币政策的决心。【原文：The Bank of Japan must raise interest rates to at least 1% by late next year, hawkish policymaker Naoki Tamura said on Thursday, reinforcing the bank's resolve to persist with steady monetary tightening.】

item.title: 美国经销商表示担忧后，Stellantis 为自己辩护
item.description: 汽车制造商 Stellantis 周三告诉其美国经销商，8 月份的销量比 7 月份增长了 21%，经销商库存连续两个月减少了约 10%。【原文：Automaker Stellantis told its U.S. dealers on Wednesday that its August sales were up 21% from July, and its dealer inventory was reduced for two consecutive months by approximately 10%.】

item.title: 澳大利亚九大娱乐公司首席执行官迈克-斯尼斯比下台
item.description: 澳大利亚广播公司 Nine Entertainment 周四表示，首席执行官迈克-斯尼斯比（Mike Sneesby）将于 9 月 30 日卸任，首席财务与战略官马特-斯坦顿（Matt Stanton）将临时接任。【原文：Australian broadcaster Nine Entertainment said on Thursday Chief Executive Officer Mike Sneesby would step down with effect from Sept. 30 and that chief finance and strategy officer Matt Stanton would take over on an interim basis.】

item.title: 调查显示美国企业对中国的乐观程度降至历史最低点
item.description: 一项调查显示，政治紧张局势、中国经济增长放缓以及激烈的国内竞争正在削弱美国企业对中国的信心，他们对五年前景的乐观情绪降至历史最低点。【原文：Political tensions, China's slowing economic growth and fierce domestic competition are sapping the confidence of U.S. businesses in the country, with optimism about their five-year outlook falling to a record low, a survey showed.】

item.title: 需求下降迹象超过美国飓风影响，油价持平
item.description: 周四油价持平，原因是对需求下降的担忧抹去了上一交易日受飓风弗朗辛对全球最大原油生产国美国产量的影响而出现的涨幅。【原文：Oil prices were flat on Thursday as concerns about lower demand erased the gains from the previous session spurred by Hurricane's Francine's impact on output in the U.S., the world's biggest crude producer.】

item.title: 美元坚挺，通胀数据浇灭了美联储大幅降息的赌注
item.description: 美元兑欧元周四接近四周高点，此前有迹象表明美国通胀仍有一定的持续性，这增强了人们对美联储下周将避免超大规模降息的预期。【原文：The dollar traded near a four-week high versus the euro on Thursday after signs of some stickiness in U.S. inflation reinforced expectations that the Federal Reserve would avoid a super-sized interest rate cut next week.】

item.title: 预计 2024 年墨西哥商用车销量将创历史新高
item.description: 墨西哥汽车分销商协会（AMDA）周三表示，今年墨西哥商用车的销量可能创下历史新高。【原文：Sales of commercial vehicles in Mexico could hit a record this year, the Mexican Automotive Distributors Association (AMDA) said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本 8 月批发通胀放缓，减轻日本央行压力
item.description: 周四的数据显示，由于日元反弹拖累了进口成本，日本8月份的年度批发通胀率有所放缓，从而减轻了央行近期加息以应对价格上涨风险的压力。【原文：Japan's annual wholesale inflation slowed in August as the yen's rebound weighed on import costs, data showed on Thursday, taking some pressure off the central bank to address upward price risks with near-term interest rate hikes.】

item.title: Rho Motion 称，尽管欧洲电动汽车销量创 19 个月新低，但 8 月份全球电动汽车销量仍增长 20
item.description: 市场研究公司 Rho Motion 周四表示，尽管欧洲 8 月份的销量下降了 33%，创下了自 2023 年 1 月以来最弱的一个月，但在中国创纪录的高销量推动下，8 月份全球全电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车的销量仍同比增长了 20%。【原文：Global sales of fully electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles rose by a yearly 20% in August, driven by record high sales in China, and despite a 33% drop in Europe to its weakest month since January 2023, market research firm Rho Motion said on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧盟最高隐私监管机构对谷歌人工智能合规性展开调查
item.description: 谷歌的主要欧盟隐私监管机构周四开始调查这家搜索引擎巨头在使用欧盟用户的个人数据帮助开发其基础人工智能模型之前，是否充分保护了这些数据。【原文：Google's lead EU privacy regulator opened an inquiry on Thursday into whether the search engine giant adequately protected European Union users' personal data before using it to help develop its foundational AI Model.】

item.title: 视频游戏公司因 "欺骗消费者 "遭欧盟投诉
item.description: 电子游戏公司 Epic Games、Electronic Arts、Roblox 和其他四家公司周四遭到欧盟消费者投诉，指控它们误导玩家消费。【原文：Videogame companies Epic Games, Electronic Arts , Roblox and four others were hit with an EU consumer complaint on Thursday accusing them of misleading gamers into spending money.】

item.title: 文件显示，23andMe 首席执行官 Wojcicki 对第三方收购公司的提议持开放态度
item.description: 周三的一份监管文件显示，23andMe 联合创始人兼首席执行官安妮-沃西基（Anne Wojcicki）愿意考虑第三方对公司的收购建议。【原文：23andMe co-founder and chief executive Anne Wojcicki would be open to considering third-party takeover proposals for the company, a regulatory filing showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 经济增长放缓，前景不明，欧洲央行将降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行几乎肯定会在周四再次降息，但尽管欧元区经济停滞不前，通胀风险依然存在，投资者将在其声明中寻找进一步宽松的线索。【原文：The European Central Bank is almost certain to cut interest rates again on Thursday, but with inflation risks still simmering despite a stuttering euro zone economy, investors will be searching its statements for clues about further easing.】

item.title: 美国通胀拉锯战后，亚洲市场开盘强劲
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: UPS 称美国南部路易斯安那州的服务可能受到飓风弗朗辛的影响
item.description: 联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service）周三表示，受飓风 "弗朗辛"（Francine）的影响，该公司在美国南部地区，尤其是路易斯安那州的取件和递送服务可能会受到影响。【原文：United Parcel Service said on Wednesday its pickup and delivery services in the southern part of the U.S., especially Louisiana, may be impacted due to Hurricane Francine.】

item.title: 美国议员敦促拜登堵住中国小包装进口的关税 "漏洞
item.description: 周三，美国众议院大多数民主党议员敦促乔-拜登总统利用其行政权力结束针对低价值包裹的关税 "漏洞"，他们认为中国电子商务公司和芬太尼毒贩利用了这一 "漏洞"。【原文：A majority of Democratic U.S. House of Representatives members on Wednesday urged President Joe Biden to use his executive powers to end a tariff "loophole" for low-value packages that they say are being exploited by Chinese e-commerce firms and fentanyl traffickers.】

item.title: 消息人士称，诺福克南方公司正在商讨首席执行官离职事宜，寻找临时负责人
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士周三透露，诺福克南方公司正在就首席执行官艾伦-肖（Alan Shaw）的离职进行谈判，董事会正在考虑临时替代人选，其中包括现任首席财务官，因为发现这位高管与一名下属有染。【原文：Norfolk Southern is negotiating CEO Alan Shaw's exit, and the board is considering interim replacements, including the current chief financial officer, after finding the executive had a relationship with a subordinate, three sources familiar with the matter said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 裕信银行如何收购德国商业银行股份，以求在德国发展壮大
item.description: 周二深夜的欧洲，投资者的疑虑与日俱增。德国政府在市场上出售德国商业银行（Commerzbank）股票的努力陷入了僵局。【原文：It was late on Tuesday evening in Europe and investors' suspicions were growing. The German government's efforts to sell Commerzbank shares in a market placement, on the face of it, a simple task, were stalling.】

item.title: 亚马逊的 AWS 将在巴西投资 18 亿美元，直至 2034 年
item.description: 亚马逊云计算部门亚马逊网络服务公司（AWS）周三表示，将在巴西投资101亿雷亚尔（约合18亿美元），直至2034年，以扩大其在巴西的数据中心业务。【原文：Amazon's cloud computing arm, Amazon Web Services (AWS), will invest 10.1 billion reais ($1.8 billion) in Brazil through 2034 to expand its data center operations in the country, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，OpenAI 正在洽谈以 1,500 亿美元的估值进行融资
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三报道，人工智能重量级企业 OpenAI 正在讨论以 1500 亿美元的估值融资 65 亿美元。【原文：AI heavyweight OpenAI is discussing raising $6.5 billion at a valuation of $150 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 阿根廷 8 月通胀依然顽固，居民努力储蓄
item.description: 周三公布的官方数据显示，阿根廷 8 月份的月通胀率为 4.2%，高于路透社预测的 3.9%，略高于 7 月份的 4.0%。【原文：Argentina's monthly inflation rate stood at 4.2% in August, official data published on Wednesday showed, as prices came in above a Reuters forecast of 3.9% and up slightly from 4.0% in July.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局局长称对美国联合航空公司的安全审查 "基本完成
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）局长周三表示，该局已基本完成 3 月份开始的对美国联合航空公司的审查，以确保该航空公司遵守安全规定。【原文：The head of the Federal Aviation Administration said on Wednesday that the agency has nearly completed the review of United Airlines it opened in March to ensure the carrier's compliance with safety regulations.】

item.title: 消息人士称，丹麦 DSV 在德国铁路申克公司 140 亿欧元的竞购中胜出
item.description: 丹麦物流公司 DSV 在收购德国国营铁路 Deutsche Bahn 旗下铁路物流部门全球国际货运公司（Schenker）的竞争中胜出。【原文：Danish logistics company DSV won the race to buy Schenker, the rail logistics arm of German state railway Deutsche Bahn, sources at the railway and at the German government said.】

item.title: 首席执行官表示，RTX 将优先进行精简，而非大规模并购
item.description: RTX 公司首席执行官周三表示，该公司愿意对现有业务进行修剪和配对，而不是进行 "变革性 "并购。【原文：RTX is open to pruning and pairing its existing businesses rather than pursuing "transformative" mergers and acquisitions, the aerospace giant's CEO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国央行监管机构称亚特兰大联储博斯蒂克违反交易规则
item.description: 美联储内部监察机构周三称，亚特兰大联储主席拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）违反了美国央行关于官员如何进行交易和投资的政策，同时指出他没有根据机密信息进行交易。【原文：Atlanta Federal Reserve President Raphael Bostic violated U.S. central bank policies governing how officials could trade and invest, the Fed's in-house watchdog said on Wednesday, while noting that he did not trade based on confidential information.】

item.title: 美国银行业高管因预期升温而谨慎行事
item.description: 一些美国顶级银行的高管告诫说，不要对盈利预测过于乐观，并警告说，交易环境落后于预期，给这个自去年以来一直处于压力之下的行业的前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Executives at some top U.S. banks cautioned against overly optimistic earnings projections and warned that the dealmaking environment was lagging expectations, clouding the outlook for a sector under stress since last year.】

item.title: 高盛首席执行官公司驳斥通用汽车信用卡退出混乱的说法
item.description: 高盛集团首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）周三驳斥了该行提前退出与通用汽车的信用卡合作关系是一团糟的说法，称该公司已经预料到了问题的存在。【原文：Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon on Wednesday dismissed the notion that the bank's early exit from its credit card partnership with General Motors was messy, saying the firm had anticipated the problems.】
